entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Specify supported custom type marshalling features on CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute #66121
  • [wasm][aot] `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Unit.Tests` failing due to `Maximum call stack size exceeded` #66118
  • msftbot could be taught about the `source-generator` label. #66115
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl.Tests creates files not easily removed #66108
  • SSE Instructions for `System.Math` and `System.MathF` classes #66104
  • JIT: Consider asserting on schema allocation failure #66103
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json using significant memory when serializing with custom converters #66102
  • Fix interaction of PGO and partial compilation #66101
  • Test build failure: The type 'EventPipeProvider' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced #66099
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById() returns Process objects for non-running processes #66096
  • AssemblyLoadContext Unload does not release PDB file #66091
  • Reference source files aren't representing the public api contract that customers bind on #66090
    7.0.0
  • JIT ARM64: Funclets with "frame type 5" not handled correctly #66089
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Are RdXmlFile properties transitive? #66085
  • TIME OUT - Mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release #66083
  • span.copyto(span) crashes at linux-arm64 platform in .net6 #66082
  • Possible bug for `LoggerMessageAttribute` generator when having an `ExpressionBody` #66080
  • Compiling application with LanguageExt as a dependency and ReadyToRun enabled using .NET 6 #66079
  • `ProviderAliasAttribute` can be sealed? #66078
  • Queryable.Where causing performance issue in .NET 6 #66076
  • Possible memory leak in EventSource logger? #66072
  • Reduce the trim requirements on MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute #66069
  • Createdump can not generate dump file when the service in a container restarts. #66074
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Small refactoring suggested in 65842 #66068
  • superpmi: add Extensions page to superpmi-replay pipeline to surface failures #66067
    Future
  • LoggerMessage DefineScope Boxing/Unboxing Performance #66064
  • Some `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` tests are timing out #66059
  • Could not load type 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe' from assembly 'System.Runtime, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'. #66056
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse1\\ConvertToInt32_ro\\ConvertToInt32_ro.cmd #66052
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/basics/tryfaulttrycatch_il_d/tryfaulttrycatch_il_d.sh #66050
  • Test failure profiler\\transitions\\transitions\\transitions.cmd #66049
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Bmi2.X64\\Bmi2.X64_ro\\Bmi2.X64_ro.cmd #66048
  • Returned writer from XmlDictionaryWriter.CreateTextWriter doesn't implement IXmlTextWriterInitializer #66045
  • Store static fields with `[FixedAddressValueType]` in the Pinned Object Heap. #66043

Closed

  • Automate Diffing of Release, Checked and Debug JITs #5884
    7.0.0
  • Create checked/release SuperPMI asm diffs AzDO pipeline #49949
    7.0.0
  • Interop\Windows\BCrypt\Cng.cs does not follow the Interop guidelines #14588
    Future
  • system.reflection.tests.nullabilityinfocontexttests.nullablepubliconlyothertypestest #66100
    7.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback::ObjectsAllocatedByClass does not work anymore since dotnet 6 #63806
    7.0.0
  • Regression of Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection with Unity and WebGL #65620
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'found' during 'Profile instrumentation' #65987
  • Assertion failed 'schema.size() > 0' during 'Profile instrumentation' #65977
    7.0.0
  • Runtime error with system.text.json if a model includes action type for source generator #64871
  • Update RegexGenerator to fail better on unsupported platforms #66047
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Windows test failures - `PrecompiledRegex_*` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #65978
  • dotnet-trace needs to work better with apps that has the EventSourceSupport feature switched off #46047
    7.0.0
  • Q: track remote state using Task #65782
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluation of functions returning char #65064
    7.0.0
  • Avoid RegexWriter for RegexOptions.Compiled, RegexOptions.NonBacktracking, and source generator #62450
    7.0.0
  • Terrible implementation of EmailAddressAttribute screwed up my database. #65968
  • `System.Runtime.InteropServices.GetEndComSlotTests.GetEndComSlot_Windows_ReturnsExpected` failing on windows #66058
    7.0.0
  • Interop source generator should insert [GeneratedCodeAttribute] #64562
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Collections.ContainsFalse<String> #54167
    7.0.0
  • DateOnly string interpolation causes OOM crash #66040
  • Consider adding algorithm-agnostic X509Certificate2.GetPublicKey() and X509Certificate2.GetPrivateKey() #17269
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Backporting recent fixes related to AVX and suspension. #66120
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix marshalling issue with BerVal #66119
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Add a comment in source-generated regexes explaining why they cannot have optimized code. #66114
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Annotating Native CoreLib library to be AOT friendly #66112
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update RegexGenerator to require LangVersion > 10 #66111
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [tests] Update eventsvalidation tests to use intree Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #66110
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Skip Upper vector save/restore for blocks that THROW #66109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add hash and tiering name to assert message #66107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a target to force packages which reference serviced packages to also be serviced #66106
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: tolerate schema mismatches in partial compilation with pgo #66105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend Equals/StartsWith auto-vectorization for OrdinalIgnoreCase #66095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port commits from PR-48140 to dotnet 5.0. #66087
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for static virtual methods #66084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix performance regression in SSL handshake #66077
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use ApiCompatTask in ApiCompat.proj #66073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • Fix copy propagation #66070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Run superpmi-replay pipeline on JIT PRs #66063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation (#65250)" #66060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Fix return code when failing to load ICU data #66055
    area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][jit] Fix an assert in the local register allocator. #66054
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Just a test for CI ignore #66053
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix handling of atomic nodes in RegexCompiler / source generator #66046
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating native traces from JS, using a symbols file #66042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Try to work around random CI failures in "dotnet restore" of benchmarks #66116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Partition SuperPMI replay task #66065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not value number locals on the LHS #65902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch field being examined by NullablePublicOnlyOtherTypesTest #66113
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix cross-arch build compilation error about missing O_RDONLY #66094
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable Match_Timeout_Repetition_Throws test with NonBacktracking #66093
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use generic `Enum` methods when possible. #64850
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable SuperPMI replay jobs until #65332 is fixed #66062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix interaction of PGO and partial compilation #66061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix S.T.Regex test failures due to line ending differences #66017
    arch-wasm
  • Address TODO to switch to generated p/invoke #66057
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • EE Suspension on x86 should use RtlRestoreContext when available #65878
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Keep CLSCompliantAttribute in sync for src <-> ref #66075
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-preview2][mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65867
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Simplify RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray #66011
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65842
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid RegexCode/RegexWriter for all engines other than RegexInterpreter #65986
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Make DllImportGenerator emit a GeneratedCodeAttribute on our stubs #65868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Update path to regex tests project, to be excluded for AOT #66044
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove incorrect exception comment from AsSpan #66051
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix div-by-zero introduced in #65926 #66035
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Adding Count(ReadOnlySpan<char>) Overloads #66026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix NonBacktracking quadratic behavior with deep loops #66038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [WIP] Run trim analyzer #65870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Update the StubManager for better debugger stepping. #65947
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • attempt to fix up EnterpriseTests #65981
    area-System.Net
  • Host test error format #65730
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.3.22151.18` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add Android 32 to RID graph #66022
    area-Meta
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 5.0.16 #66020
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rename `DllImportGenerator` project to `LibraryImportGenerator` #66029
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [tests] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    area-Interop-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Convert* for Vector{64, 128} on ARM64 #65946
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable default marshalling for bool #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Move Array.CreateInstance methods to shared CoreLib #66025
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Condition Windows SslCertificateTrust test on Registry value #65848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Get rid of fallback to process ids enumeration in ProcessManager.IsProcessRunning (Windows) #65041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 6.0.4 #66021
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • Merikhamoyan vector intrinsics operators #66002
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #65785
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Decommit region tails #66008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.4
  • [Draft] Remove reference projects from nearly all out-of-band projects #65775
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono] Remove support for nint/nuint/nfloat from mini-native-types.c #65967
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #65854
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove pinning from number formatting in corelib #65962
    area-System.Runtime
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Request: Set IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract default to true #24181
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • CS0234 'Http' does not exist in the namespace 'System.Net' when targeting .NET Fx 4.x with implicit usings #24146

PullRequests

Created

  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24169
    Area-Infrastructure
  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24168
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Hard code a few system.net.http versions #23871
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update some test package versions #23976
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.213 #24154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.104 #24156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.202 #24157
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.418 #24159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport #24086 to release/6.0.2xx #24100
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • reenable composite r2r singlefile test on OSX #23934
    Area-SingleFile
  • Fix cli translation issue in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #23882
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.407 #24155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Workload update timer #24104
    Area-Workloads
  • Update 6.0.3xx with the 6.0.200 version of files #23977
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24130
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Blame switch args should not swallow following arg #23722
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Large value type properties/ref set accessors #5854

Updated

  • Enum extensions #3491
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set
  • Discussion: C# Break nested loop #869

PullRequests

  • Add docs task to the feature template #5852
  • Add main attributes proposal #5817
    Proposal
  • Update pattern-variables.md #5781

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • KeyNotFoundException from Pythia.AbstractPythiaCompletionProvider.GetTextChangeAsync #59895
  • Quick Info on built-in operators #59894
  • Implicit struct initialization: handle fields at any depth? #59890
  • LSIF tool fails with duplicate analyzers #59883
    17.2
  • Roslyn fails to work when RSA+SHA1 is not available #59880
  • GetTypeInfo reports no nullability when deconstructing #59875
  • SA1210 is inconsistent with IDE's Remove and Sort Usings (casing) #59873
    Backlog

Closed

  • Visual Studio hangs when typing """ #59741
    17.2
  • Pasting into a raw string literal should ensure things stay parseable. #59820
    17.3
  • Opening a Source Generator file resulted in a handful of gold bars #57618
    17.2
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project has no documentation on how the Documents are populated. #57709
    17.2
  • Remove final newline if `insert_final_newline = false` #59729
    17.2
  • IDE help after typing `struct record Foo` #59534
    17.2
  • Namespace segments are clickable inside hovers but they lead to nowhere #59335
    Next
  • Inconsistent warning and error for similar patterns that always fail #59860

PullRequests

Created

  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Break out embedded language classification entirely from normal classification #59896
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unnecessary conditional logic from FlowAnalysisPass #59892
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix handling for source generated documents in LSIF #59891
    Area-IDE
  • Add new feature to fix invalid constraints. #59889
    Area-IDE
  • Fix pattern based arguments in ForEachLoopOperationInfo without binding assumptions #59887
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Exclude object's methods from ref struct completion list #59884
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59881
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Additional tests for pattern matching on `Span<char>` #59876
    Area-Compilers
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #59874
    Area-Compilers
  • Further simplification experiments #59871
    Area-IDE
  • Further simplification experiments #59870
    Area-IDE
  • Experiment with changing simplification algorithm. #59869
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/patterns-span-char #59868
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Flatten Implementation directory #59886
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Port additional tests to the new integration test harness #59854
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update go-to-def handler to support entirely async go-to-def operation. #59801
    Area-IDE
  • Notify docs team for new breaking change documentation #59844
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Disallow string null constant as pattern for Span<char> #59847
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix issues pressing 'enter' in a raw string literal #59848
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert accidental prerelease version bump. #59882
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Account for possible cache invalidation on a different thread in assert. #59842
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59878
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address layering of navigation action in code actions #59856
    Area-IDE
  • Removed navigation target and navigation hint from namespaces #59793
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59877
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59872
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add note about redirection for documenting IDExxxx #59107
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Use ExceptionUtilities.UnexpectedValue instead of Unreachable #59849
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Port new rename UI to release/dev17.2 #59841
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59859
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update PublishData for 17.3 #59857
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59898
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow generate ctor intent to specify accessibility #59730
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.2.P2
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Async navigation5 #59838
    Area-IDE
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Check for prototype comments in separate job #59862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • View call hierarchy fix (#57856) #59739
    Area-IDE, Community, auto-merge
  • Annotate BreakpointSpans and fix NREs #59846
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify the simplification code. #59864
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Make navigate-to navigation cancellable. #59828
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/rigibson/check prototype2 #59865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use ValueTuple element names in minimal route handlers #40510
  • [API Review]: Add support for endpoint filters in minimal APIs #40506
  • Hot reload doesn't work on F5 but works when run `dotnet watch` #40502
  • Generate typescript type definitions for invoking Blazor libraries #40499
  • ANCM intermittently notifies the wrong HttpContext of disconnect #40498
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Webassembly - Debugger crashes app #40497
  • Passing tab character to API returns bad request #40495
  • Blazor hosted site thorw 503 on IIS and IIS Express, works fine in kestrel #40494

Closed

  • HttpLoggingMiddleware logs an "empty" message for Response when disabled #40427
    7.0-preview3
  • Custom configuration provider with options pattern always returns empty values #40490
  • Source generators from M.E.Logging.Abstractions conflict with source generators in the transport package #34048
    7.0-preview3
  • [7.0 preview 1] HTTP DELETE sometimes treated as HTTP POST #40301
  • React to hostfxr locating logic #8838
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update Selenium versions #40509
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40508
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40504
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Default to 3 local retries #40503
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add support for endpoint filters in minimal APIs #40491
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • [main] Update Selenium versions #40488
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Correct Identity.Test project #40492
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, 7.0-preview3
  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40487
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Enable trimming for Http.Abstractions #40430
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump karma from 6.3.14 to 6.3.16 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #40500
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • Don't always create log for Response in HttpLoggingMiddleware #40457
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.7 to 1.5.10 in /src/Components/Web.JS #40441
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/5.0] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40351
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Use WixBundleName instead of WixBundle #40352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40218
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • [release/3.1] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40220

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mac Catalyst CMD+Q doesn't close application #5026
  • Running installed .NET MAUI Blazor app fails on Windows #5024
  • Maui's usage of Reflection to find op_Implicit operators is not trim-compatible #5023
  • Mac Catalyst Blazor WebView CMD+SHIFT+I doesn't open dev tools #5022
  • XamlC should optimize CornerRadiusTypeConverter and FontSizeConverter ConvertFromInvariantString #5018
  • Implicit styles not applied to underlying items depending on where they are set. #5016
  • OnIdiom issue with Windows #5014
  • Events for headset connection status. #5000
  • Make BindableProperty trim-compatible #4997

Closed

  • Update DualScreen controls to use new Window Jetpack on Android #1753
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Blazor Hybrid WinForms apps give error if there's an ErrorBoundary #4502
  • Blazor WebView iOS Zoom Support #4996
  • MenuBar #4640
  • Using device styles throws an InvalidOperationException #4987
  • [Bug] Push to top using minus margin or TranslateY make CollectionView disappear #4686
  • [Bug] ControlTemplate isn't rendering #2302
  • Proposal: Remove Application.Properties #4864
  • [Bug] IntentFilter WebAuthenticator - Resources+NotFoundException appIcon #2902
  • button text does not display content！ #3902

PullRequests

Created

  • Loaded/Unloaded events and propagate Window #5027
  • Use TextHighlighter to implement background color for Span #5025
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
  • [shell] minor performance improvements #5013
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Remove FontImageExtension #5012
    area/Xaml </>, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Fix iOS CollectionView update when not visible #5011
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove unused ExportFontAttribute.EmbeddedFontResourceId property #5010
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Remove `DisableImplicitNamespaceImports` config #5009
  • Implement IBorder on Windows #5008
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Update SearchBar TextColor property if TraitCollection changes #5004
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-entry
  • [Android] Changes to avoid an EditText issue with RecyclerView scroll #5003
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] ClipRect in MauiScrollView Draw method #5002
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Update cursor visibility when IsReadOnly Property changes on Entry #5001
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-entry
  • Implement InputTransparent #4995

Merged

  • Revert "Hide Keyboard in Android Entry and Editor when back key is pressed #5019
  • Remove Application.Properties implementation #4976
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Don't set the text on android if value matches #4992

Updated

  • Make Maui.Core, Controls.Core, and Controls.Xaml Trimmable #5028
  • Map Controls.Picker.TextTransform #4967
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Fix template build to use correct slashes on all platforms #4991
    area/templates 📄
  • Remove all usage of Device throughout the repo #4982
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Android] Implement pending focus management logic in Handlers #4914
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos tests are being skipped locally even when the emulator is running #27556
  • EF Core 6 breaking change #27555
  • Source Generator for EFCore for DB First users. #27553
  • ForeignKey annotation used on key property in combination with value conversion fails #27551
  • Implement bulk deletion #27550
  • Owned attribute adds TempId column to principal entity when foreign key type has conversion #27549
  • Pre-model convention configuration overrides foreign key data type #27548
  • Use RETURNING/OUTPUT clause for UPDATE #27547
  • Throws System.InvalidOperationException where Any is used with FromSqlRaw #27546
  • ef migrations bundle error: warning MSB3026 - The process cannot access the file #27544
  • Is there a sample for running ef migration bundles on linux agents? #27541

Closed

  • Table Per Type Causes Check Constrained to be Duplicated onto the base table when Creating a migration. #24219
    7.0.0
  • index added to model not being added in migration #27552
  • Query: enable temporal tables for table splitting scenarios #26469
    7.0.0-preview2
  • Typo in link #27453
    7.0.0-preview3
  • EF core 6 returns null value for owned entity #27516
  • Replacing the Reflection with Source Generators? #27543
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - migration rollback doesn't work #27375
    6.0.4
  • Issue thrown when application is shutting down #27168
    6.0.4
  • Collection_navigation_equal_to_null_for_subquery fails after merging from release/6.0 #27356
    6.0.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop deleting orphans for optional relationships configured for cascade deletes #27557
    breaking-change
  • Remove DisableImplicitNamespaceImports config #27545

Merged

  • Map check constraints only to the tables for which they are declared #27511
  • Fix doc link type #27454
  • Remove quirks #27542
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27539
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27540
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27537
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27356 - Collection_navigation_equal_to_null_for_subquery fails after merging from release/6.0 #27429
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] SQLite: Don't modify collection while enumerating inside ReclaimLeakedConnections #27428
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27375 - EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - migration rollback doesn't work #27379
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix automated SQL baseline rewriting #27530

Updated

  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions where possible #27500
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27423 - Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27452
  • feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces #27483

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • .NET MAUI should not be installable from .NET 7 #13246
  • The Runtime version of “ASP.NET Core Runtime” and “.NET Windows Desktop Runtime” in .NET 7.0 Preview 2 SDK are 7.0.0-preview.3.xxx. #13262

Updated

  • Installing the 6.0.2 ref pack MSI removes the 6.0.0 ref pack MSI #13237
  • Runtime dependencies in Ubuntu Jammy 22.04 #13281

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix the logic that generates the fallback text file #12790
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
  • Update branding to 5.0.213 #13292
  • Update branding to 5.0.407 #13293
  • Update branding to 6.0.104 #13294
  • Update branding to 3.1.418 #13299
  • Always run sb bootstrap CI leg #13300
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13302
  • Update source-build's MsftToSbSdk baseline #13296

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.202 #13295
  • Disable component governance for the non-shipping legs. #13243
  • Merge 6.0.200 into 6.0.3xx #13236
  • Rewrite smoke-tests.sh in new test framework based smoke tests #13286
